resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/70802</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>70802</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>
    <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120727</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120727</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120727</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Polje  povzročeno z oscilacijo naboja</string>
            <string language="en">Field produced by oscillating charge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fangen Sie produziert durch 
oszillierende Ladung auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Champ produit par la charge d'oscillation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O campo produziu pela carga oscilando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il campo ha prodotto dalla carica oscillante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πεδίο που παράγεται από την ταλαντεμένος δαπάνη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Campo producido por la carga oscilante</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Silnice elekričnega polja izvirajoč iz pozitivnega naboja ob nihanju povzročijo radiacijsko polje.</string>
            <string language="en">Field lines of a electric field caused by oscillating positive charge are causing radiation field.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">em valovanje</string>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">silnica polja</string>
            <string language="en">field line</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektromagnetno valovanje</string>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fangen Sie Zeilen von einem 
elektrischem auffangen verursacht durch oszillierende 
positive Ladung verursachen Strahlung auffangen auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les lignes de zone d'un champ électrique 
provoqué par la charge positive d'oscillation causent le champ de 
rayonnement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As linhas do campo de um campo elétrico causado 
pela carga positiva oscilando estão causando o campo de radiação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le righe del campo di un campo elettrico causato 
dalla carica positiva oscillante stanno causando il campo 
elettromagnetico di radiazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι γραμμές πεδίων ενός ηλεκτρικού πεδίου που 
προκαλείται από την ταλαντεμένος θετική δαπάνη προκαλούν το 
πεδίο ακτινοβολίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las líneas del campo de un campo eléctrico 
causado por la carga positiva oscilante están causando el campo de 
radiación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektromagnetische Wellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fangen Sie Zeile auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektromagnetische Strahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ondes électromagnétiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ligne de zone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rayonnement électromagnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ondas eletromagnéticas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">linha do campo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">radiação eletromagnética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">onde elettromagnetiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riga del campo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">radiazione elettromagnetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρομαγνητικά κύματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμμή πεδίων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρομαγνητική ακτινοβολία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ondas electromagnéticas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">línea del campo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">radiación electromágnetica</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
